name: 더 좋은 민첩스탯
description: 기존의 스피디 덱스의 수치를 조정하고 이동시 스테미너 소모를 조절했습니다. 민첩1당 5씩 오름,걷기 스테미너 소모 기존대비 3분의1수준

name: PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_BURN_RATE
info: Sets base stamina burn per 100 moves of the walking player.

description: Your skill in throwing objects over a distance.  Skill increases accuracy, and at higher levels, the range of a throw.

Comprised of an automatic rifle carbine designed to fire a pistol cartridge, submachine guns can reload and fire quickly, sometimes in bursts, but they are relatively inaccurate and may be prone to mechanical failures.
